page.title: 07THE VILLAGE OF MORTON
page.content: { Morton has a lot of open country around it.Walking round Morton can be quite pleasing and pleasant with its silent,subtle peacefulness.If people walk up Alma (a large hill),after a short while they will reach a pub named "Dick Hudsons",this pub has a small recreation area for younger children. An indoor partition containing a Jukebox,and one or two arcade games.And last of all the pub, "The Busfield Arms"for a quiet drink. There are three small churches in Morton ,which are frequently visited by the people of Morton.There are two congregational churches,and one catholic church. It has the basic shops for a community:A bakery,a newsagents, a post office, and a greengrocers who travels locally in a van.
